title: Headcannon for Aatrox
body:
I don't have strong feelings on the kit, it looks fine but very different. 

But his voice over really bothers me. It just seems like the personification of "COME AT ME Bro." I'll miss the calm artist of bloodshed. But I've come up with my own idea on it. Prerework is Aatrox first host/original body. This rework is him taking a new host (my guess frelord to explain his connection to Tryndamer.) Id probably be completely crazy after 1000 years with out a body too
